title: International migrant stock, total
name: sm.pop.totl
readme: International migrant stock, total is the number of people at mid-year born in a country other than that in which they live. It also includes refugees.

fields.name: Country Code
fields.description: ISO 3-digit ISO code extended to include regional codes e.g. EUR, ARB etc

fields.name: Value
fields.description: International migrant stock, total is the number of people at mid-year born in a country other than that in which they live. It also includes refugees.
